addGoalTooltip: Add a goal to the scene at the specified location.
allowActorsOutsidePlayspaceTooltip: Allow actors to move off the playspace, where they can't be seen
allowActorsToLeaveThePlayspace: Allow actors to leave the playspace
calloutPutCommandsHereRunStart: Ásat deike gohčostagaid maid galgá čađahit go prográmma vuolgá johtui
calloutBlocklyPlaceGoUpHere: Ásat lihkat bajás - dása lihkadan dihtii bajásguvlui
calloutClickEvents: Click on the events header to see event function blocks.
calloutUseArrowButtons: Álggahan dihtii lihkadeami deaddil dáid boaluid dahje boallobeavddi njuollaboaluid
calloutUseArrowButtonsAutoSteer: Mii leat čiehkan prográmmakoda man leat čállán muhto sáhtát aŋkke geavahit njuollaboaluid lihkadeapmái
calloutMoveRightRunButton: Lasit du kodai nuppi lihkat olgešguvlui -gohčostaga ja coahkkal dan čađahan dihtii du prográmma
calloutBlocklyMoveRightRunButton: Lasit du kodai nuppi "lihkat olgešguvlui" -gohčostaga ja coahkkal dan čađahan dihtii du prográmma
calloutShowCodeToggle: Deaddil dán lonuhan dihtii guppol- ja teakstaoidnosiid gaskkas
calloutShowCodeCanToggle: Sáhtát deaddilit dása lonuhan dihtii ruovttoluotta teakstahápmái
calloutShowPlaceGoUpHere: Ásat lihkat bajás -gohčostaga lihkadan dihtii bajás
calloutShowPlaySound: Dát lea du speallu, nuba oaččut válljet jienaid friddja. Iskka válljet gahčahanfálus mannu eará jiena.
calloutInstructions: Itgo dieđe maid dahkat? Deaddil rávvagiid oaidnin dihtii daid ođđasit
calloutPlaceTwo: Oaččutgo guokte Sáhpándroidda boahtit oidnosii álo go fáhtet ovtta Sáhpándroidda?
calloutPlaceTwoWhenTauntaun: Oaččutgo guokte Mynock oidnot go fáhtet Tauntaun?
calloutSetDroidAndSpeed: Ásat du droida ja dan leavttu
calloutFinishButton: Deaddil dán go leat gárvvis joatkit spealu
calloutBlocklyCategories: Sáhtát deaddilit Gohčostagat oaidnin dihtii buot iešguđetge gohčostagaid ja Dáhpáhusaid oaidnin dihtii buot fállun leahkki dáhpáhusaid
tapOrClickToReset: Deaddil dahje klikke máhccan dihtii álgodillái
dontAllowActorsToLeaveThePlayspace: Don't allow actors to leave the playspace
dropletBlock_changeScore_param0_descript: Árvu mii lasihuvvo čuokkismearrái (negatiiva árvvut geahpedit čuokkismeari).
dropletBlock_moveLeft_description: Moves the droid to the left.
dropletBlock_moveSlow_description: Changes a set of characters to move slowly.
dropletBlock_moveSlow_param0_description: The type of characters to be changed ('random', 'Stormtrooper', 'RebelPilot', 'PufferPig', 'Mynock', 'MouseDroid', 'Tauntaun', or 'Probot').
dropletBlock_moveNormal_description: Changes a set of characters to move at a normal speed.
dropletBlock_moveNormal_param0_descripti: The type of characters to be changed ('random', 'Stormtrooper', 'RebelPilot', 'PufferPig', 'Mynock', 'MouseDroid', 'Tauntaun', or 'Probot').
dropletBlock_moveFast_description: Changes a set of characters to move quickly.
dropletBlock_moveFast_param0_description: The type of characters to be changed ('random', 'Stormtrooper', 'RebelPilot', 'PufferPig', 'Mynock', 'MouseDroid', 'Tauntaun', or 'Probot').
dropletBlock_playSound_param0_descriptio: The name of the sound to play.
dropletBlock_removePoints_param0_descrip: The value to remove from the score.
dropletBlock_setBackground_param0_descri: The name of the background theme ('random', 'endor', 'hoth', or 'starship').
dropletBlock_setDroid_param0_description: The name of the droid image ('random', 'R2-D2', or 'C-3PO').
dropletBlock_setSpritePosition_descripti: Instantly moves an actor to the specified location.
dropletBlock_setSpriteSpeed_description: Sets the speed of an actor.
dropletBlock_setSprite_param0_descriptio: The index (starting at 0) indicating which actor should change.
dropletBlock_setSprite_param1_descriptio: The name of the actor image.
dropletBlock_setToChase_description: Changes a set of characters to chase the droid.
dropletBlock_setToChase_param0_descripti: The type of characters to be changed ('random', 'Stormtrooper', 'RebelPilot', 'PufferPig', 'Mynock', 'MouseDroid', 'Tauntaun', or 'Probot').
dropletBlock_setToFlee_description: Changes a set of characters to flee from the droid.
dropletBlock_setToFlee_param0_descriptio: The type of characters to be changed ('random', 'Stormtrooper', 'RebelPilot', 'PufferPig', 'Mynock', 'MouseDroid', 'Tauntaun', or 'Probot').
dropletBlock_setToRoam_description: Changes a set of characters to roam freely.
dropletBlock_setToRoam_param0_descriptio: The type of characters to be changed ('random', 'Stormtrooper', 'RebelPilot', 'PufferPig', 'Mynock', 'MouseDroid', 'Tauntaun', or 'Probot').
dropletBlock_setToStop_description: Changes a set of characters to stop moving.
dropletBlock_setToStop_param0_descriptio: The type of characters to be changed ('random', 'Stormtrooper', 'RebelPilot', 'PufferPig', 'Mynock', 'MouseDroid', 'Tauntaun', or 'Probot').
dropletBlock_setMap_description: Changes the map in the scene.
dropletBlock_setMap_param0_description: The name of the map ('random', 'blank', 'circle', 'circle2', 'horizontal', 'grid', or 'blobs').
dropletBlock_throw_description: Throws a projectile from the specified actor.
dropletBlock_endGame_param0_description: Whether the game was won or lost ('win', 'lose').
dropletBlock_whenDown_description: This function executes when the down button is pressed.
dropletBlock_whenGetCharacter_descriptio: This function executes when the droid gets any character.
dropletBlock_whenGetStormtrooper_descrip: This function executes when the droid gets Stormtrooper characters.
dropletBlock_whenGetRebelPilot_descripti: This function executes when the droid gets Rebel Pilot characters.
dropletBlock_whenGetPufferPig_descriptio: This function executes when the droid gets Puffer Pig characters.
dropletBlock_whenGetMynock_description: This function executes when the droid gets Mynock characters.
dropletBlock_whenGetMouseDroid_descripti: This function executes when the droid gets Mouse Droid characters.
dropletBlock_whenGetTauntaun_description: This function executes when the droid gets Tauntaun characters.
dropletBlock_whenGetProbot_description: Dát funkšuvdna čađahuvvo go droida fáhte Probott.
dropletBlock_whenLeft_description: This function executes when the left button is pressed.
dropletBlock_whenRight_description: This function executes when the right button is pressed.
dropletBlock_whenTouchCharacter_descript: This function executes when the droid touches any character.
dropletBlock_whenTouchObstacle_descripti: This function executes when the droid touches any obstacle.
dropletBlock_whenTouchStormtrooper_descr: This function executes when the droid touches Stormtrooper characters.
dropletBlock_whenTouchRebelPilot_descrip: This function executes when the droid touches Rebel Pilot characters.
dropletBlock_whenTouchPufferPig_descript: This function executes when the droid touches Puffer Pig characters.
dropletBlock_whenTouchMynock_description: This function executes when the droid touches Mynock characters.
dropletBlock_whenTouchMouseDroid_descrip: This function executes when the droid touches Mouse Droid characters.
dropletBlock_whenTouchTauntaun_descripti: This function executes when the droid touches Tauntaun characters.
dropletBlock_whenTouchProbot_description: This function executes when the droid touches Probot characters.
dropletBlock_whenUp_description: This function executes when the up button is pressed.
endGameTooltip: End the game as either a win or a loss.
extraFunction: Leat addán funkšuvdnii ođđa nama {funcName}, man dihtii dat ii doaimma. Geavat funkšuvnna álgoálgosaš nama.
finalLevel: Congratulations! You have solved the final puzzle.
getActorHasEmotionTooltip: Gets if the actor is in a particular mood
getScoreTooltip: A variable representing the player's score
hoc2015_reinfFeedbackMsg: Sáhtát deaddit boalu "{backButton}" máhccan dihtii speallat.
hoc2015_move_right_instructions: “Mii dárbbašit duon doapparmetálla [scrapmetal1]. BB-8, sáhtátgo viežžat dan?”
hoc2015_move_right_down_instructions: “Mii dárbbašit eambo doapparmetálla [scrapmetal2]. Sáhtátgo čoaggit visot metállaid dán guovllus?"
hoc2015_move_finale_instructions: "Mii dárbbašit velá 4 stuhka metálla [scrapmetal2]. Gávnnatgo daid?"
hoc2015_event_two_items_instructions: "R2-D2, Dárbbašan du sádden dihtii dehálaš dieđu Gaikárpilohtaide [rebelpilot]."
hoc2015_event_four_items_instructions: "Mana visot Gaikárpilohtaid [rebelpilot] lusa nu jođánit go sáhtát."
hoc2015_score_instructions2: Čuoggát lasihuvvojit. Lasit čuoggáid álo go R2-D2 čohkke Gaikárpilohtaid [rebelpilot]. Čohkke 900 čuoggá vuoitin dihtii.
hoc2015_win_lose_instructions2: Lasit 100 čuoggá go R2-D2 čohkke Gaikárpilohtaid[rebelpilot]. Sihko 100 jus son čohkke Stoarbmasoalddáid [stormtrooper]. Go leat čoaggán 200 čuoggá čađahat spealu. (Sáhtát addit čuoggáid maiddái Mynockain [mynock] álkivuođa dihtii.)
hoc2015_add_characters_instructions2: Lasit golbma Báisaspiinni [pufferpig] planehttii. Dasto mana váldit daid.
hoc2015_chain_characters_instructions2: Álo go fáhtet Tauntauna [tauntaun], bija guokte dahje máŋga Mynock  [mynock] oidnot. Čoakke oktiibuot 8 Mynock.
hoc2015_multiply_characters_instructions: Oaččutgo ainjuo guokte Sáhpándroida [mousedroid] oidnot álo go R2-D2 fáhtet ovtta Sáhpándroida? Čoakke 20 Sápandroida.
hoc2015_change_setting_instructions2: Geavat ođđa gohčostagaid lonuhan dihtii du droida ja dan leavttu. Dan maŋŋá čohkke Gaikárpilohtaid [rebelpilot].
hoc2015_event_free_instructions2: Dieđát dál buot dárbbašlačča huksen dihtii du lágan spealu. Sáhtát friddja iskat iešguhtege dáhpáhusaid ja gohčostagaid. Go leat gárvvis, coahkkal Gárvvis-boalu joatkin dihtii.
localFunction: You have placed {funcName} inside another function. You should move {funcName} to a different location in your program.
makeProjectileTooltip: Make the projectile that just collided disappear or bounce.
makeYourOwn: Make Your Own Play Lab App
moveDistanceTooltip: Move an actor a specific distance in the specified direction.
moveLeftTooltip: Move an actor to the left.
moveRightTooltip: Move an actor to the right.
moveDownLeftTooltip: Move an actor diagonally down and to the left.
moveDownRightTooltip: Move an actor diagonally down and to the right.
moveUpLeftTooltip: Move an actor diagonally up and to the left.
moveUpRightTooltip: Move an actor diagonally up and to the right.
nextLevel: Congratulations! You have completed this puzzle.
numBlocksNeeded: This puzzle can be solved with %1 blocks.
onEventTooltip: Execute code in response to the specified event.
reinfFeedbackMsg: You can press the "{backButton}" button to go back to playing your story.
repeatForeverTooltip: Execute the actions in this block repeatedly while the story is running.
saySpriteTooltip: Pop up a speech bubble with the associated text from the specified actor.
setActivityTooltip: Sets the activity for a set of characters
setDroidSpeedRandom: set droid to a random speed
setDroidSpeedSlow: set droid to a slow speed
setDroidSpeedNormal: set droid to a normal speed
setDroidSpeedFast: set droid to a fast speed
setDroidSpeedTooltip: Sets the speed of the droid
setItemSpeedTooltip: Sets the speed for a set of characters
setScoreTextTooltip: Sets the text to be displayed in the score area.
setScoreTooltip: Sets the player's score to the specified amount
setSpritePositionTooltip: Instantly moves an actor to the specified location.
setSpriteK1Tooltip: Shows or hides the specified actor.
setSpriteSizeTooltip: Sets the size of an actor
setSpriteSpeedTooltip: Sets the speed of an actor
setSpriteBehaviorTooltip: Set the behavior of the selected actor
setSpritesChaseTooltip: Makes all the selected actors chase another actor
setSpritesFleeTooltip: Makes all the selected actors flee from another actor
setSpritesStopTooltip: Makes all the selected actors stop wandering, chasing, or fleeing
setSpritesWanderTooltip: Makes all the selected actors wander around the screen at random
setMapTooltip: Changes the map in the scene
shareStudioTwitter: Check out the story I made. I wrote it myself with @codeorg
showCoordinatesTooltip: show the protagonist's coordinates on the screen
showTitleScreenTooltip: Show a title screen with the associated title and text.
startSetVars: game_vars (title, subtitle, background, target, danger, player)
throwTooltip: Throws a projectile from the specified actor.
turnTooltip: Turn an actor left or right by 90 degrees.
waitParamsTooltip: Waits for a specified number of seconds or use zero to wait until a click occurs.
waitTooltip: Waits for a specified amount of time or until a click occurs.
whenArrowTooltip: Execute the actions below when the specified arrow key is pressed.
whenDownTooltip: Execute the actions below when the down arrow key is pressed.
whenGameStartsTooltip: Execute the actions below when the story starts.
whenGetAllCharactersTooltip: Execute the actions below when the droid gets all the characters.
whenGetAllCharacterClassTooltip: Execute the actions below when the droid gets all characters of a type.
whenGetCharacterTooltip: Execute the actions below when an actor gets the specified type of character.
whenLeftTooltip: Execute the actions below when the left arrow key is pressed.
whenRightTooltip: Execute the actions below when the right arrow key is pressed.
whenSpriteAndGroupCollideTooltip: when an actor collides with any actor of the given type
whenSpriteClickedTooltip: Execute the actions below when an actor is clicked.
whenSpriteCollidedTooltip: Execute the actions below when an actor touches another actor.
whenTouchCharacterTooltip: Execute the actions below when the actor touches a character.
whenTouchObstacleTooltip: Execute the actions below when the actor touches an obstacle.
whenTouchGoalTooltip: Execute the actions below when the actor touches a goal.
whenUpTooltip: Execute the actions below when the up arrow key is pressed.
failedHassetDroidSpeed: Next time, set a droid speed.
failedTouchAllItems: Next time, get all the items.
failedScoreMinimum: Next time, reach the minimum score.
failedRemovedItemCount: Next time, get the right number of items.
failedSetActivity: Next time, set the correct character activity.
failedAvoidHazard: "Uh oh, a Bandit got you!  Try again."
failedTwoItemsTimeout: You need to get the Rebel Pilots before time runs out. To move, put the goUp and goDown commands inside the whenUpKey and whenDownKey functions. Then, press and hold the arrow keys on your keyboard (or screen) to move quickly.
failedTwoItemsTimeoutBlockly: You need to get the Rebel Pilots before time runs out. To move, attach the "go up" and "go down" blocks to the "when up arrow" and "when down arrow" blocks. Then, press and hold the arrow keys on your keyboard (or screen) to move quickly.
failedFourItemsTimeout: The game ran out of time.  Try pressing and holding the arrow keys on your keyboard (or screen) to move faster.  If the keys don't work, check that you have goUp inside whenUp, and so on.
failedFourItemsTimeoutBlockly: The game ran out of time.  Try pressing and holding the arrow keys on your keyboard (or screen) to move faster.  If the keys don't work, check that you have "go up" inside "when up arrow", and so on.
failedScoreTimeout: Try to reach all the Rebel Pilots before time runs out. To move faster, press and hold the arrow keys on your keyboard (or screen).
failedScoreScore: You got the Rebel Pilots, but you need at least 900 points to pass the puzzle. Use the addPoints command to add lots of points when you get a Rebel Pilot.
failedScoreScoreBlockly: You got the Rebel Pilots, but you need at least 900 points to pass the puzzle. Use the "add points" block to add lots of points when you get a Rebel Pilot.
failedScoreGoals: You used the addPoints command, but not in the right place. Can you put it inside the whenGetRebelPilot function so R2-D2 can't get points until he gets a Rebel Pilot?
failedWinLoseTimeout: Try to reach all the Rebel Pilots before time runs out. To move faster, press and hold the arrow keys on your keyboard (or screen).
failedWinLoseScore: You need 200 points to pass the puzzle. Try adding more points with the addPoints command. You can use the Mynock to make it easier. To move faster, press and hold the arrow keys on your keyboard (or screen).
failedWinLoseScoreBlockly: You need 200 points to pass the puzzle. Try adding more points with the "add points" block. You can use the Mynock to make it easier. To move faster, press and hold the arrow keys on your keyboard (or screen).
failedWinLoseGoals: You used the addPoints command, but not in the right place. Can you make it so that the command is only called when you get the Rebel Pilot? Also, remove points when you touch the Stormtrooper.
failedWinLoseGoalsBlockly: You used the "add points" block, but not in the right place. Can you make it so that the block only executes when you get the Rebel Pilot? Also, remove points when you touch the Stormtrooper.
failedAddCharactersTimeout: Use three addCharacter commands at the top of your program to add Puffer Pigs when you hit run. Now go get them.
failedAddCharactersTimeoutBlockly: Use three "add a Puffer Pig" blocks at the top of your program to add Puffer Pigs when you hit run. Now go get them.
failedChainCharactersTimeout: You need to get 8 Mynocks. Can you make two (or more) of them appear every time you get a Tauntaun? Make it easier by adding more Mynocks.
failedChainCharactersTimeoutGotSome: Congratulations, you added code to make Mynocks. You can go to the next puzzle or try again to get 8 of them.
failedMultiplyCharactersTimeout: You need to get 20 Mouse Droids.  Make sure you add two or more Mouse Droids every time you get one.
failedMultiplyCharactersTimeoutBlockly: You need to get 20 Mouse Droids. Use the "add a Mouse Droid" command inside the "when get Mouse Droid" event to add two or more Mouse Droids every time you get one.
failedMultiplyCharactersTimeoutGotSome: Congratulations, you added code to make Mouse Droids. You can go to the next puzzle or try again to get 20 Mouse Droids. Try making it easier by adding more of them! (Press and hold the keys on your keyboard (or screen) to move faster.)
failedChangeSettingTimeout: Get three Rebel Pilots to move on.
failedChangeSettingSettings: Make the game your own. To pass this puzzle, you need to change your droid and set its speed.
